message:
Advanced PHP web Development course.
-----------------------------
Pre-requests: web background and passing personal interview.
Starting time: TBD according to the 
Location:3/4 Anwer El-Moffty Street, Nasr City, Cairo.
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 4 hours each for 2 months.
Duration : 64 hours.
Fees: 1250 LE.

Instructors: Ahmed Kamal, Ahemd Swilam, Ahmed Raslan.
Contact: Shady, Cell: 0111800897

Notes: 
1- Training and job opportunities are available for outstanding students. 
2- Please check the course outline.
3- Instructors cv are available upon request.
4- The personal Interview is a must.
